87.movie_plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

1.movie_plot: An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a city's water supply.

164.movie_plot: Snake Plissken is once again called in by the United States government to recover a potential doomsday device from Los Angeles, now an autonomous island where undesirables are deported.

64.movie_name: All About My Mother (Todo Sobre Mi Madre) (1999)
64.movie_plot: Young Esteban wants to become a writer and also to discover the identity of his father, carefully concealed by his mother Manuela.

120.movie_plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

167.movie_plot: In the midst of the Gulf War, soldiers are kidnapped and brainwashed for sinister purposes.

104.movie_plot: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

24.movie_plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

148.movie_plot: Three friends discover their new flatmate dead but loaded with cash.

113.movie_plot: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

131.movie_plot: Jake Blues, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.

52.movie_plot: In London, four very different people team up to commit armed robbery, then try to doublecross each other for the loot.

98.movie_plot: A perfect red-colored violin inspires passion, making its way through three centuries over several owners and countries, eventually ending up at an auction where it may find a new owner.

25.movie_plot: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there while another team approaches with another agenda.

156.movie_plot: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

19.movie_plot: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?

93.movie_plot: A troubled man talks to his suicidal sister's psychiatrist about their family history and falls in love with her in the process.

51.movie_plot: When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.

3.movie_name: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937)
3.movie_plot: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

127.movie_plot: A recently widowed man's son calls a radio talk-show in an attempt to find his father a partner.

95.movie_plot: Photographer Robert Kincaid wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson, for four days in the 1960s.

21.movie_plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

134.movie_plot: With the help of a talking freeway billboard, a wacky weatherman tries to win the heart of an English newspaper reporter, who is struggling to make sense of the strange world of early 1990s Los Angeles.

108.movie_plot: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

124.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

146.movie_plot: An FBI agent persuades a social worker, who is adept with a new experimental technology, to enter the mind of a comatose serial killer in order to learn where he has hidden his latest kidnap victim.

54.movie_plot: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner and a young man.

101.movie_plot: In Canton, Mississippi, a fearless young lawyer and his assistant defend a black man accused of murdering two white men who raped his 10-year-old daughter, inciting violent retribution and revenge from the Ku Klux Klan.

159.movie_plot: John Rambo is released from prison by the government for a top-secret covert mission to the last place on Earth he'd want to return - the jungles of Vietnam.

32.movie_name: Like Water for Chocolate (Como agua para chocolate) (1992)
32.movie_plot: When tradition prevents her from marrying the man she loves, a young woman discovers she has a unique talent for cooking.

89.movie_plot: In 1839, the revolt of Mende captives aboard a Spanish owned ship causes a major controversy in the United States when the ship is captured off the coast of Long Island. The courts must decide whether the Mende are slaves or legally free.

71.movie_plot: An inventor spurns his city life to move his family into the jungles of Central America to make a utopia.

116.movie_plot: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high flying masked hero.

166.movie_plot: A film that successfully argued that a man was wrongly convicted for murder by a corrupt justice system in Dallas County, Texas.
